titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-Methyl-4-methoxy-6-methylamino-1,3,5-triazine.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/30/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-Methyl-4-methoxy-6-methylamino-1,3,5-triazine.
